Speakerpedia | Rails Software Engineer | Austin, TX or Remote

http://www.speakerpedia.com

We are looking for full-stack Rails developers to join our team to help build the #1 analytics and booking platform for speakers and celebrities. We're using big data to help influencers optimize their revenue stream -- this year we've worked with a diverse talent including Taylor Swift, Trevor Noah, Seth Godin, Malala Yousafzai, and Ronda Rousey. Experience with elastic and data science tools are a plus. We're a profitable, engineering-driven team where you can make a big impact. You can work from our office in Austin or remote.

Email: jack@federatedtalent.com
